Template.Name: Windows Application
Template.LongDescription:
Creates a Windows Application.

This application uses the Windows Multiple Dialog Interface (MDI).

The application component is a container for the various views (data entry, reporting and business processess) that make up your windows application. All of these views will be added to the main application object.

Template.Name: Web Application
Template.LongDescription:
Creates a skeleton Web Application.

A web application can be used to provide web services using SOAP, or provide services to server-side scripting in ASP files running on IIS (Internet Information Server).

Web Application modules are designed to host Web Browser Objects (WBO) and / or Web Server Objects (WSO).

Template.Name: Basic Application
Template.LongDescription: Creates a generic Visual DataFlex application.\n\nThis template can be used as the basis for building any kind of application.

Template.Name: Data Entry View
Template.LongDescription:
Creates a skeleton data entry form for a single database view.

The database view is constructed by assembling a structure of data dictionary objects.

Template.Name: Tabbed View
Template.LongDescription:
Creates a skeleton data entry form for multiple database views. 

Each database view is constructed by assembling a structure of data dictionary objects. Each database view is contained within one page of a tab dialog.

Template.Name: Data Entry View Wizard
Template.LongDescription:
Creates a data entry form for a database view.

This wizard supports single record layout or header - detail layout using a grid for the child table.

Fields may also be arranged into tab pages.

Template.Name: Lookup Wizard
Template.LongDescription:
Wizard for creating a table lookup dialog and connecting it to a data dictionary.

Table lookups, or lookup lists, can be associated with table fields in the table's data dictionary. This provides a popup lookup list wherever that field is used in a data entry view.

Template.Name: Table Lookup
Template.LongDescription: Creates a table lookup dialog. \n\nTable lookups, or lookup lists, can be associated with table fields in the table's data dictionary. This provides a popup lookup list wherever that field is used in a data entry view.

Template.Name: Modal Dialog
Template.LongDescription: Creates a generic modal dialog.

Template.Name: Modal Dialog (db Aware)
Template.BriefDescription: Modal Dialog template with DDO support
Template.LongDescription: Creates a modal dialog component with support for data dictionary object structures.\n\nA dbModalDialog component is functionally similar to a View component except that the dialog component is desigend to operate modally, i.e. while it is active, the user cannot operate outside the dialog.

Template.Name: About Dialog
Template.LongDescription: Creates a new 'about' dialog.\n\nThe dialog displays application information such as the program name, company name and version information. It also provides support for displaying a system information dialog.

Template.Name: Password Dialog
Template.LongDescription: Creates a new password dialog.\n\nA password dialog contains two forms -- one for the user id and another for the user password. You will need to code the valdation of those two tems.

Template.Name: Winprint2 Report Wizard
Template.BriefDescription: Report Wizard for WinPrint 2 report engine
Template.LongDescription: Creates a database report that uses the Winprint 2 reporting engine.

Template.Name: Crystal Report Integration Wizard
Template.LongDescription: Creates a report view for launching a Crystal Report.\n\nYou must first define the Crystal Report before running this integration wizard.

Template.Name: Report View
Template.LongDescription: Creates a skeleton report view.

Template.Name: Web Browser Object
Template.LongDescription: Creates a skeleton web browser object.\n\nWeb browser objects are used in conjunction with ASP files to produce dynamic web pages.

Template.Name: WBO Entry Wizard
Template.LongDescription:
Creates a Web Browser Object (WBO) and an Active Server Page (ASP) file.

The WBO is designed to perform database services for for the ASP file. The ASP file is designed as a data entry form to the database view described in the WBO.

The output of the ASP file is HTML.

Template.Name: WBO Report Wizard
Template.LongDescription:
Creates a Web Browser Object (WBO) and an Active Server Page (ASP) file.

The WBO is designed to perform database services for for the ASP file. The ASP file is designed as simple report for the database view described in the WBO.

The output of the ASP file is HTML.

Template.Name: WBO Child Report Wizard
Template.LongDescription:
Creates a Web Browser Object (WBO) and an Active Server Page (ASP) file.

The WBO is designed to perform database services for for the ASP file. The ASP file is designed as header/detail style report for the database view described in the WBO.

The output of the ASP file is HTML.

Template.Name: WBO - WML Entry Wizard
Template.BriefDescription: Web Browser Object - WML Entry Wizard
Template.LongDescription:
Creates a Web Browser Object (WBO) and an Active Server Page (ASP) file.

The WBO is designed to perform database services for for the ASP file. 

The ASP file is designed as a simple data entry form for a mobile device. The form uses the database view described in the WBO.

The output of the ASP file is WML.

Template.Name: WBO - WML Report Wizard
Template.BriefDescription: Web Browser Object - WML Report Wizard
Template.LongDescription:
Creates a Web Browser Object (WBO) and an Active Server Page (ASP) file.

The WBO is designed to perform database services for for the ASP file. 

The ASP file is designed as a simple report for a mobile device. The report uses the database view described in the WBO.

The output of the ASP file is WML.

Template.Name: Web Service Object
Template.BriefDescription: Creates a Server Side web-service object
Template.LongDescription: Allows you to create server side web-service objects. These objects can be added to your web application allowing you provide web services to any client

Template.Name: Business Process
Template.LongDescription: Creates a skeleton business process dialog for a database view.

Template.Name: ASP
Template.LongDescription: Creates a skeleton classic ASP file.

Template.Name: HTML
Template.LongDescription: Creates a skeleton HTML file.

Template.Name: Class Creation Wizard
Template.BriefDescription: Wizard for creating a local workspace subclass
Template.LongDescription: Wizard for creating a subclass local to the current workspace.\n\nThe subclass will be added to the controls palette for use in the Studio's visual designer.

Template.Name: Class Template
Template.LongDescription: Creates a Visual DataFlex class declaration package with class template code.

Template.Name: Empty Package
Template.LongDescription: Creates an empty Visual DataFlex source file (package).
